All Classes

Class Description
Card
This class creates cards for the game.
Client
This class handles the client connection.
ConnectionType
This class contains only two params, it only can be SERVER or CLIENT
DeckStack
This class is an stack, here is saved all the card from deck
Game  
GameController
In this class is the combination of the game logic and the interface logic.
HandCardList
This is a circular double linked list, which contains the hand card nodes.
HandCardNode
This class is the node of the hand card list.
Hencheman
This class sets characteristics of hencheman type cards.
HistoryList
This is a double linked list which contains history nodes. the user can navigate forward to the end or backward to the beginning.
HistoryNode
This class creates nodes for the linked list of history, it contains all the information necessary to show the recent play
MenuController
This class controller all the MenuView of the game.
MonsterTECGApp
This is the main class which extends from javaFX application, this is the first class that is executed.
Player
Esta clase se maneja toda la informacion relacionada con el jugador como el nomrbe, vida y mana
Secret  
Server
This class handles the server connection.
Spell  
UpdateInfo
This class updates the info in the other player game.
